Class TeacherGradeShortQuestionController

public class TeacherGradeShortQuestionController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for short question grading system.

Wan Hanzhe

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initialize the table, choice boxes and buttons.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - unused.
      resourceBundle - unused.

    • filter

      public void filter()
      Called when the user clicks the filter button. Filter the records according to the filter.

    • grade

      public void grade()
      Called when the user selects a submission record and clicks the grade button. Short question records will be displayed in another table. The first column is the short question, the second column is the student's answer, the third column is the score of that question. The teacher can grade the submission and enter the score, which should be non-negative and no larger than the sum of scores of all short questions.

    • submit

      public void submit()
      Called when the user clicks the submit button. The total score and short question score of the submission is updated according to the score given by the user.

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Called automatically after the teacher graded a submission. Initialize the table, choice boxes and buttons.
